author: shaolinint
body:
Expected behavior
-----------------
Successfully register repository?

Actual behavior
---------------
Segmentation fault sudo powershell
```
PS /home/shaolinint/powershell> Register-PSRepository -Name "PSGallery" –SourceLocation "https://www.powershellgallery.com/api/v2/" -InstallationPolicy Trusted
[1]    4365 segmentation fault  sudo powershell
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
PSEdition                      Core
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.12
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

comments.author: bmanikm
iSazonov
comments.body: I close the old Issue. If problem still exists it should be tracked in PowerShellGet repo.

title: Segmentation fault
